snippet: Newman’s Own gives all its profit to charity, but that message on its labels didn’t seem to stand out to a generation known to favor companies with social consciences....
abstract: Advertising column; Newman's Own is launching media campaign to make socially conscious millennials aware firm donates all its profits; worked with production company Narrative Content Group to reword product labels and produce videos for social media spotlighting several of 600 charities brand aids every year.
lead_paragraph: Newman’s Own gives all its profit to charity, but that message on its labels didn’t seem to stand out to a generation known to favor companies with social consciences.

headline.print_headline: Paul Newman Who? A Company Shifts to Reach Millennials
headline.main: Paul Newman Who? Salad Dressing Company Adjusts to Reach Millennials
